pullRequest.title: Fix for jakarta feature name change

beforeCommit.message: Added simple fix for jakarta feature name change

afterCommit.message: Added simple fix for jakarta feature name change

nodes.bodyText: we can remove this case, or throw an exception here. All public features should have a version component

Lets move this block after the standard replacement block -- we should prefer standard replacements over the special case replacements generally.
Also, we need to support both directions: EE7/8 --> EE9 but also EE9 --> EE7/8
For this we can simply iterate over featuresWithNameChangeOnEE9.entrySet() and check if replacementFeature is the key or the value, and if it is, check the opposite entry (value or key respectively) for the replacement.

beforeCommit.message:
Made requested changes
- Updated feature replacement to use default the base features and later check for renamed features
- Updated feature replacement so renamed features works both ee9->ee7/ee8 and ee7/ee8->ee9
- Updated feature replacement to throw exception if dash is omitted
